pullRequest.title: Get a file of all libraries during download
pullRequest.bodyText:
little file generation to get all binaries-list in one file.
May save lots of time (15 per build) for Maven artefacts generation
related to: apache/netbeans-mavenutils-nb-repository-plugin#2

commit.message: Get a file of all libraries during download

nodes.bodyText: Please use the getBytes(Charset) variant. Depending on the default file encoding can lead to bugs.
The append looks strange here (you have a delete / touch before this). Why not just use StandardOpenOption.CREATE?

commit.message: put file creation into ant task and use UTF-8
